Denda Perusak Lingkungan Rp 19 Triliun Baru Dibayar Rp 330 M, Ini Masalahnya
07 Nov 2019, 11:09 by Andi Saputra
Jakarta - Kementerian Lingkungan Hidup dan Kehutanan (KLHK) memenangkan gugatan atas perusahaan perusak lingkungan mencapai Rp 19,1 triliun. Namun, dari jumlah itu, baru Rp 330 miliar yang dibayar dan disetor ke kas negara. Apa masalahnya?
"Total putusan gugatan ganti rugi dan pemulihan perkara perdata lingkungan hidup yang sudah inkrah mencapai Rp 19,51 triliun dan khusus untuk perkara karhutla Rp 3,15 triliun," kata Dirjen Penegakan Hukum KLHK Rasio Ridho Sani kepada detikcom, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Total ganti rugi yang telah disetorkan ke kas negara dari perkara perdata lingkungan hidup sebesar Rp 110,76 miliar. Total seluruh ganti rugi, termasuk penyelesaian sengketa di luar pengadilan yang sudah disetorkan ke negara Rp 220,83 miliar.
"Kami akan secara intensif terus berkoordinasi dengan para pihak, termasuk ketua PN untuk percepatan proses eksekusi ini," ujar Rasio.

An Environmental Damage Penalty of Rp. 19 Trillion Just Paid Rp. 330 Billion, This Is the Problem
Nov 7 2019, 11:09 by Andi Saputra
Jakarta - The Ministry of Environment and Forestry (KLHK) won a lawsuit over damaging companies reaching Rp 19.1 trillion. However, of that amount, only IDR 330 billion was paid and paid into the state treasury. What is the problem?
"The total verdicts for compensation and restoration of environmental civil cases which have reached Rp 19.51 trillion and specifically for the case of forest and land damage Rp. 3.15 trillion," Director General of Law Enforcement KLHK Ratio Ridho Sani told AFP on Thursday (7/11 / 2019).
The total compensation that has been deposited in the state treasury from environmental civil cases is Rp 110.76 billion. The total amount of compensation, including the settlement of disputes outside the court, which had been deposited in the state was Rp 220.83 billion.
"We will continue to intensively coordinate with the parties, including the PN chief to accelerate the execution process," said Rasio.
